alert.note: Alert for Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:11PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Houston, northeastern Jackson, southwestern Miller, southwestern Early and Seminole Counties through 900 PM EDT/800 PM CDT/... At 811 PM EDT/711 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ashford, or 12 miles northeast of Cottonwood, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Donalsonville, Ashford, Cowarts, Webb, Malone, Avon, Gordon, Iron City, Jakin, Bascom, Saffold, Pansey, Crosby, Little Hope, Enon, Lovedale, Barber, Riverturn, Sharphagen and Hornsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
